name: Space Gems (ACour008)
description:
SPACE GEMS

A simple match-3 game. It's like Bejeweled, but worse!

This game is a demo/prototype which means that while the main mechanics of this fabulous Match-3 is working, other features may not be fully functional. Please notify me on itch.io if you spot any bugs detrimental to the gameplay.

How to play

- Click a square and then any adjacent square to swap space gems. If you make a match, you score!

Music credits

Credits to all music (in order of appearance) found here: shorturl.at/dmqxy
